name: Patient Departing - Tracking
description: Patient tracking notification when patient leaves current location but does not involve official census bed change
businessPurpose: Track patient movement for temporary location changes, transport between facilities, or non-census location updates
timing: Sent when patient departs current location for temporary movement not affecting official bed assignment
realWorldScenarios: Patient going to radiology for imaging
Temporary move for room cleaning or maintenance

generationRules.trackingStatus: In transit or at temporary location
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Medium - tracking for safety and workflow, not census management
